definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The pay phone is in front of the bank.
sentences.chinese: 投币式公用电话在银行前面。

sentences.english: The public telephone has been vandalized.
sentences.chinese: 饭店大厅里有一部公用电话。

sentences.english: The free public phone is about ten meters from the room to the right.
sentences.chinese: 免费公用电话就在出门口右拐，十米左右的地方。

sentences.english: Is there a public phone near here？
This system is applied to network management for booth in the city.
sentences.chinese: 该系统适用于城市公用电话自动计费器的网络管理。

sentences.english: Can I make an overseas call through public phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用公用电话打国际长途吗？

sentences.english: For example, the public-switched telephone network can only transport circuit-switched information.
sentences.chinese: 例如，公用电话网的电路交流的信息只能传送。

sentences.english: Is there a pay phone nearby?
At some point, you probably stopped to wonder where all the pay phones had gone.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，你会停下来想，那些公用电话全都去哪啦？

sentences.english: There is a pay phone in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 附近有一个投币式公用电话。

sentences.english: She used a payphone to call 911 and report the incident.
sentences.chinese: 她用公用电话叫了911，报告了这起事故。

sentences.english: A man uses a payphone in the new business district.
sentences.chinese: 一个男人在新的商业区打公用电话。

sentences.english: In this paper a long-distance blood pressure measurement system by public telephone net is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文中介绍基于公用电话网的远程血压监测系统。

sentences.english: He had to use this public telephone.
sentences.chinese: 他只得施用这部公用电话。

sentences.english: Some major stops also are equipped with public telephones.
sentences.chinese: 有的车站棚内还有公用电话。

definition: Personal Handy-phone System (PHS), mobile network system operating in China 1998-2013, branded "Little Smart"
to notify sb of a call/to call sb to the phone
neighborhood telephone, with sb in charge of notifying others when they receive a call
to make a long distance call
